changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `${table.prefix}system_config` ( `id` bigint unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT 'Primary Key', `type` tinyint(2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Type (0: boot configuration; 1: popular recommendation of template center)', `i18n_name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL COMMENT 'i18n key', `config_map` json NOT NULL DEFAULT ('{}') COMMENT 'Configuration value', `is_deleted` tinyint unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Delete Tag(0: No, 1: Yes)', `created_by` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT 'Creator', `updated_by` bigint NOT NULL COMMENT 'Last Update By', `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Create Time', `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP COMMENT 'Update Time', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT='System Config Table';

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: Template Property Table add i18n_name field
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}template_property` ADD COLUMN `i18n_name` varchar(50) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'zh_CN' COMMENT 'i18n key' AFTER `property_code`;

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: Template Property Rel Table add property_code field
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}template_property_rel` ADD COLUMN `property_code` varchar(20) CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'Property Code' AFTER `property_id`;

changeSet.author: Chambers
changeSet.comment: Template Property Rel Table add property_code index
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}template_property_rel` ADD INDEX `idx_property_code`(`property_code`) USING BTREE;
